explains: adj. 故意的，蓄意的；从容的，小心翼翼的；深思熟虑的
v. 仔细考虑，认真商讨
wordGroup: take time to deliberate 做事要深思熟虑
deliberate on 审议；仔细研究，考虑

sentences.en: This was a deliberate piece of misinformation.
sentences.cn: 这是一条故意提供的虚假消息。

sentences.en: Witnesses say the firing was deliberate and sustained.
sentences.cn: 目击者说这次射击是蓄意的，而且还持续了一段时间。

sentences.en: The deliberate cruelty of his words cut her like a knife.
sentences.cn: 他故意说的残酷无情的话对她像刀割一样。
